body_text:
Where is this picture from? How do I use Reverse Image Search to find the source of an anime/manga image? So I see an image from what I believe is from either an anime or manga. What are some ways that I can go about finding what series it's from?
Try these options:

Google reverse image search (browser built-in support and plugins)
Other reverse image search engines: TinEye, SauceNao, iqdb
Technique: Cropping the image
Animated GIF: Picking the right frame

What is the name of this anime with nekomimi? 
I have been wondering for a long time which anime this is from.
